publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-178 Michael Matheson: Defenders of Human Rights - PREDA—That the Parliament notes the outstanding work of the PREDA Foundation, the People’s Recovery Empowerment and Development Assistance Foundation Inc., founded by Father Shay Cullen in 1974 and working for human rights and protecting young people from being exploited by the sex industry in the Philippines; further notes with concern the increasing threats and harassment being experienced by those working to protect sexually abused and exploited children within the Philippines, and calls on the Government of the Philippines to act on behalf of the Defenders of Human Rights and implement Article 12.2 of the UN Paris Declaration of 1998.

S2M-178 Michael Matheson: Defenders of Human Rights - PREDA—That the Parliament notes the outstanding work of the PREDA Foundation, the People’s Recovery Empowerment and Development Assistance Foundation Inc., founded by Father Shay Cullen in 1974 and working for human rights and protecting young people from being exploited by the sex industry in the Philippines; further notes with concern the increasing threats and harassment being experienced by those working to protect sexually abused and exploited children within the Philippines, and calls on the Government of the Philippines to act on behalf of the Defenders of Human Rights and implement Article 12.2 of the UN Paris Declaration of 1998. Supported by: Campbell Martin*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-178 Defenders of Human Rights - PREDA (lodged on 19 June 2003) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-178 Defenders of Human Rights - PREDA (lodged on 19 June 2003) Ms Sandra White*, Tricia Marwick*, Shiona Baird*, Brian Adam*, Stewart Stevenson*, Christine Grahame*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Robin Harper*, Carolyn Leckie*, Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-178 Defenders of Human Rights - PREDA (lodged on 19 June 2003) Alex Neil*
S2M-178 Defenders of Human Rights - PREDA (lodged on 19 June 2003) Marilyn Livingstone*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-178 Defenders of Human Rights - PREDA (lodged on 19 June 2003) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-178 Defenders of Human Rights - PREDA (lodged on 19 June 2003) Elaine Smith*
S2M-178 Defenders of Human Rights - PREDA (lodged on 19 June 2003) Marlyn Glen*
